QuestData.Title: Nemesis: Hunter - Hunted
QuestData.Description: Our enemies surround us, and with each passing day their numbers grow. It is time to make a decisive strike against their armies, champion.$B$BAround me stand effigies of our most hated adversaries. You will be their downfall, $n. You will become nemesis and they will run in fear at the sight of you.$B$BNow select the target of your rage and burn in effigy that race which you mean to eradicate. Speak to me when you have made your selection.
QuestData.LogDescription: Burn a Nemesis Effigy at the Gladiator's Sanctum then speak to Raza'kul.
